metadata.description: As two armies surround GERONIMO and his small band of fighters, he tells them the tale of his first war party, and also of the trials he has faced for the love of a woman. Between these places of love and death, his warriors are informed of what it is truly to be a man, and of what devotion it will take to win the great battle that awaits them in the morning.
metadata.name: Geronimo
